title: The Graveyard - The Art of MalyceGraves
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-tg-alt= --]]]

[[module CSS]]

    .rmposttitle {
        width: auto;
        height: auto;
        padding: 0px 20px 0px 50px;
    }
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[size 120%]]**The art of [http://www.scp-wiki.net/malycegraves-author Malyce Graves]**[[/size]]
[[/=]]

Over the years I have put together a fair amount of art. I never really considered making anything for the SCP-verse until I decided I //really// wanted some emblems for the two MTFs I've created.

Then, I made a [http://www.scp-wiki.net/theme:laruetheme La Rue Macabre theme.]

Now, here we are.
++ //La Rue Macabre// Art
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=La Rue Macabre|src=sigil2.png|width=400]]

@@ @@
++ Various MTF Emblems
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=MTF Beta-2 ("Bayou Boys")|src=beta2.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=MTF Pi-6 ("Clown Wranglers")|src=pi6.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=MTF Eta-5 ("Jaeger Bombers")|src=eta5.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=MTF Xi-8 ("The Last to Fall")|src=xi-8.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sp-image caption=MTF Gamma-44 ("Meat Lockers")|src=gamma-44.png|width=400]]

@@ @@

-----

@@ @@

-----
